dialogue: What's this? What is all this? Who has authorized you to come into my home and tear everything apart?
Uh... Excuse us, sir. This was all supposed to be a surprise.
Your son, Harry, told us not to expect you until tomorrow-
It is a Goddamned surprise! My mother, an ailing woman, is sitting outside on the driveway too frightened to come inside!
We are sorry to have frightened her.
-we brought her here for some peace and respite only to discover a strange Negro man roaming around our property.
Sir, your son asked us here to redo your study into a library.
We were just putting everything back in its place.
You've turned it all inside out. How the hell do you know its proper place?
